SHORT_DESCR.P: NWSSP procurement services hosted by Velindre Trust is seeking to establish a service and maintenance contract for cellular pathology, histopathology tissue preparation and processing equipment on behalf of the Cardiff and Vale University Health Board. The equipment and associated technology and consumables are utilised as part of a multidisciplinary approach to the investigation and diagnosis of disease. The overall aims being to reduce the need for equipment downtime and failure with the inherent patient risk and harm.
Award of a contract without prior publication of a call for competition in the Official Journal of the European Union.
The procurement falls outside the scope of application of the directive.

Explanation: NWSSP procurement services hosted by Velindre Trust is seeking to establish a service and maintenance contract for cellular pathology, histopathology tissue preparation and processing equipment on behalf of the Cardiff and Vale University Health Board. The equipment and associated technology and consumables are utilised as part of a multidisciplinary approach to the investigation and diagnosis of disease. The overall aims being to reduce the need for equipment downtime and failure with the inherent patient risk and harm. In particular these machines are used for, involving the collection, concentration, processing, cutting and staining of human tissue and fluid samples.

The Gold Star Service Contract covers critical items of equipment used for cellular pathology by the Histopathology and Cytopathology Departments and involves the examination of samples prior to processing and microscopically to help determine the diagnoses.
The agreement was established with the understanding that since the equipment is manufactured by Thermo Fisher there are no others suppliers within this market.
The Gold Service Contracts include the following service, preventative maintenance, corrective.
Maintenance, Spare Parts, Electrical Safety Testing after each technical intervention, technical support, Software updates.

The Gold Plan Service is required as it includes Corrective maintenance and scheduling of repair interventions are conducted through remote monitoring. Essentially the intended providers are able to identify potential errors and arrange corrective maintenance before the end-users are aware of any problems.
